amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to require the Treasury and State secretaries to report on Iranian internet censorship and applicable U.S. licensing requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
